price: 45. Tokkel tama mari inkih Bakkiimeeh num keenik maraaqinna, Yallal koroositeeniih kay farmoytit dirabboysaanamal sinni nafsi yudlumen waqdi, fayla Yallay ginó Rabbih yani-lc, isi farmoytit cateeh koros finqiseemil.
arabic: فَقُطِعَ دَابِرُ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْۚ وَٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: faquṭiʿa dābiru al-qawmi alladhīna ẓalamū wal-ḥamdu lillahi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
